簒字的基本解释

簒
cuàn
古同“篡”。

簒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cuàn］
［《廣韻》初患切，去諫，初。］
亦作“簒1”。
(1)用强力夺取。
(2)特指臣子夺取君位。
(3)指以庶夺正。
(4)弋取；射取。
(5)人体会阴部位。
(6)选择。

Basic explanation of words
簒
cuàn
Gu Tong "used".
簒
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cuàn］
["Guangyun" first cut, go to admonish, early. ]
Also known as "簒1".
(1) Capture with force.
(2) Especially referring to courtiers seizing the throne.
(3) Refers to taking the righteousness by taking advantage of it.
(4) Yi take; shoot.
(5) The perineum of the human body.
(6) Selection.
